sen.j: 独神（ひとりがみ）とは、神道において夫婦の組としてでなく単独で成った神のこと。
sen.e: Hitorigami is a Shinto deity which came into being not in pairs but alone.
Hitorigami is a Shinto deity which came into being not in pairs but alone.
Hitorigami is a Shinto deity which came into being not in pairs but alone.

sen.j: 通例として、親がいる場合はこのようには呼ばれない。
sen.e: Generally, those gods who have parents are not called this way.
Generally, those gods who have parents are not called this way.
Generally, those gods who have parents are not called this way.

sen.j: これに対して、男女一対の神を「双神」（ならびかみ）ということもある。
sen.e: In contrast, a pair of male and female deities are occasionally called "Narabigami."
In contrast, a pair of male and female deities are occasionally called "Narabigami."
In contrast, a pair of male and female deities are occasionally called 'Narabigami.'

sen.j: 類似のものに、「倶（とも）に生（な）りませる神」と「偶（たぐ）ひ生（な）りませる神」の区別がある。
sen.e: Another examples similar to this are "Tomoni-narimaseru-kami" and "Tagui-narimaseru-kami" (kami which came into being in pairs).
Another examples similar to this are "Tomoni-narimaseru-kami" and "Tagui-narimaseru-kami" (kami which came into being in pairs).
Another examples similar to this are 'Tomoni narimaseru kami' and 'Tagui narimaseru kami' (kami which came into being in pairs).

sen.j: ウマシアシカビヒコヂ
